body_html:
I don't really have a strong preference for either name. Minimizing the number of breaking changes is nice, but I guess that categorical really fits the semantics better 😕

BTW if we're changing this, we should definitely backport this to 0.3 (@soumith), so we don't do breaking changes twice (introducing distributions is breaking anyway)!
Additionally, we should deprecate .multinomial function in favor of .categorical

body:
I don't really have a strong preference for either name. Minimizing the number of breaking changes is nice, but I guess that categorical really fits the semantics better 😕

BTW if we're changing this, we should definitely backport this to 0.3 (@soumith), so we don't do breaking changes twice (introducing distributions is breaking anyway)!
Additionally, we should deprecate `.multinomial` function in favor of `.categorical`
